title: Three capitals of Uzbekistan
description: We are all used to the fact that in every country there is one special city, which is called the capital. But the centuries-old history and unique traditions of Uzbekistan do not allow us to single out just one region. And although the official capital of the Uzbek Republic is kind and hospitable Tashkent, we suggest you visit two other equally charming towns of the eastern state – Bukhara and Samarkand. Long live Uzbek adventures!
iclueded: Entrance tickets to museums, to visit attractions, monuments
Accommodation in 3* hotels (according to the program)+ Breakfast
Meeting and seeing off at the airport
excluded: International flights to and from Uzbekistan
Tips for the guide and drivers

plan.heading: One
plan.name: Arrival in the capital Tashkent, a free day for rest.
plan.description: Arrival in Tashkent It will take you from 30 minutes to 1 hour to clear customs.  At the exit you will be met by our driver in a comfortable vehicle with a sign. The meeting will be arranged according to the arrival time of your flight to Uzbekistan.   Transfer to the hotel, registration, rest  Free day in Tashkent   Overnight at a hotel in Tashkent.   Power supply: not included.   The tour manager will tell you and show you the proven places where you can have lunch and dinner with local cuisine.

plan.heading: Two
plan.name: Historical Tashkent - excursion and transfer to Samarkand by train
plan.description: Breakfast at the hotel   In the hotel lobby you will be met by a certified guide and driver in a comfortable car for a tour of Tashkent.   During the tour you will visit and you will be told about:
places: Museum of Applied Arts of Uzbekistan
The Khast-Imam complex, where the most famous Koran is kept - the Koran of Osman.
Visit the old city of Tashkent,
Chor-su bazaar, the famous market of the capital.
Monument of Courage
Visit to Independence Square
Amir Timur Square, Timurid Museum
Tashkent metro stations (optional)
departure: 17:45 Transfer to Tashkent railway station
18:45 Departure of the high-speed comfort class train from Tashkent
20:58 Arrival in Samarkand, Tamerlane's homeland

plan.heading: Three
plan.name: Famous historical places of Samarkand - city tour
plan.description: Breakfast at the hotel   In the hotel lobby you will be met by a certified guide and driver in a comfortable car for a tour of Samarkand.   During the tour you will visit and you will be told about:
places: The famous Mausoleum of Amir Timur - "Gur Emir".
Legendary Registan Square with three madrassas
Bibi Khanum Mosque.
The famous Samarkand Sieb Bazaar. Where you can buy dried fruits, flatbreads and national sweets.

plan.heading: Four
plan.name: Samarkand city tour and transfer to Bukhara by train
plan.description: Breakfast at the hotel   Check out from the hotel, in the hotel lobby you will be met by a certified guide and driver in a comfortable car for an excursion to travel outside the city of Samarkand.   During the tour you will visit and you will be told about:
places: Necropolis of Shahi Zinda from Timurid times
The Ulugbek Observatory is a unique structure of the 15th century; at the moment, a fragment of the measuring instrument "Sulse Fakhri" has been preserved
The Mausoleum of the Prophet Daniel is a holy place of worship for three religions: Muslim, Christian and Jewish
Cunha Meros Paper Mill (recreated handmade production of ancient mulberry paper, here you will see the entire paper production process
departure: 20:00 Transfer to the railway station of the city of Samarkand
21:03 Departure of the high-speed comfort class train from Samarkand
21:58 Arrival in Bukhara - the pearl of the East

plan.heading: Five
plan.name: Pearl of the East - excursion history of Bukhara
plan.description: Breakfast at the hotel   In the hotel lobby you will be met by a certified guide and driver in a comfortable car for transfer to the beginning of the tour of Bukhara.   During the tour you will visit and you will be told about:
places: The majestic Mausoleum of Ismail Samani is the burial place of the powerful and influential Emir of the Samanid Dynasty of the 9th century. The mausoleum is distinguished by a unique design and artistic brickwork, made in a manner characteristic of pre-Islamic culture
Chashma Ayub Mausoleum (Job's Well), located near the Samanid Mausoleum.
Bolo Hauz Mosque (18th-20th century)
The huge Citadel of Ark - the winter residence of the Emir of Bukhara
Kalon Mosque
Famous Kalyan Minaret
Madrasah Mir-Arab
Ulugbek Madrasah
Abdulazizkhan Madrasah with traditional majolica
Ancient trading domes of Bukhara
Magoki-Attori Mosque (12th century) in architecture special for its time.
Lyabi House

plan.heading: Six
plan.name: Bukhara - excursion trip outside the city and transfer by train to Tashkent
plan.description: Breakfast at the hotel   Check out from the hotel, in the hotel lobby you will be met by a certified guide and driver in a comfortable car for an excursion to travel outside the city of Bukhara.   During the tour you will visit and you will be told about:
places: The unique monument "Chor Minor" 1807 -1809.
Summer residence of the Emir of Bukhara Mokhi-Khosa

Necropolis of Bahauddin Naqshbandi, erected in 1544. Bahauddin Naqshbandi was an influential sheikh in Bukhara, a Suffist, and theologian. Sufis and Muslims equated visiting his burial site with a small Hajj
departure: 15:00 Transfer to the Bukhara railway station (Attention: departure and arrival times may be changed according to the train schedule)
15:50 Train departure from Bukhara
19:44 Arrival in Tashkent

title: Four pearls of Uzbekistan
description: We are all used to the fact that in every country there is one special city, which is called the capital. But the centuries-old history and unique traditions of Uzbekistan do not allow us to single out just one region. And although the official capital of the Uzbek Republic is kind and hospitable Tashkent, we suggest you visit two other equally charming towns of the eastern state – Bukhara and Samarkand. Long live Uzbek adventures!

plan.description:
Breakfast at the hotel
In the hotel lobby you will be met by a certified guide and driver in a comfortable car for a tour of Samarkand.
During the tour you will visit and you will be told about:
places: The famous Mausoleum of Amir Timur - "Gur Emir".
Legendary Registan Square with three madrassas
Bibi Khanum Mosque.
The famous Samarkand Sieb Bazaar. Where you can buy dried fruits, flatbreads and national sweets.

plan.name: Samarkand city tour and transfer to Bukhara by train
plan.description:
Breakfast at the hotel
Check out from the hotel, in the hotel lobby you will be met by a certified guide and driver in a comfortable car for an excursion to travel outside the city of Samarkand.
During the tour you will visit and you will be told about:
places: Necropolis of Shahi Zinda from Timurid times
The Ulugbek Observatory is a unique structure of the 15th century; at the moment, a fragment of the measuring instrument "Sulse Fakhri" has been preserved
The Mausoleum of the Prophet Daniel is a holy place of worship for three religions: Muslim, Christian and Jewish
Cunha Meros Paper Mill (recreated handmade production of ancient mulberry paper, here you will see the entire paper production process
departure: 20:00 Transfer to the railway station of the city of Samarkand
21:03 Departure of the high-speed comfort class train from Samarkand
21:58 Arrival in Bukhara - the pearl of the East

plan.name: Pearl of the East - excursion history of Bukhara
plan.description:
Breakfast at the hotel
In the hotel lobby you will be met by a certified guide and driver in a comfortable car for transfer to the beginning of the tour of Bukhara.
During the tour you will visit and you will be told about:
places: The majestic Mausoleum of Ismail Samani is the burial place of the powerful and influential Emir of the Samanid Dynasty of the 9th century. The mausoleum is distinguished by a unique design and artistic brickwork, made in a manner characteristic of pre-Islamic culture
Chashma Ayub Mausoleum (Job's Well), located near the Samanid Mausoleum.
Bolo Hauz Mosque (18th-20th century)
The huge Citadel of Ark - the winter residence of the Emir of Bukhara
Kalon Mosque
Famous Kalyan Minaret
Madrasah Mir-Arab
Ulugbek Madrasah
Abdulazizkhan Madrasah with traditional majolica
Ancient trading domes of Bukhara
Magoki-Attori Mosque (12th century) in architecture special for its time.
Lyabi House

plan.name: Bukhara - excursion trip outside the city and transfer by train to Tashkent
plan.description:
Breakfast at the hotel
Check out from the hotel, in the hotel lobby you will be met by a certified guide and driver in a comfortable car for an excursion to travel outside the city of Bukhara.
During the tour you will visit and you will be told about:
places: The unique monument "Chor Minor" 1807 -1809.
Summer residence of the Emir of Bukhara Mokhi-Khosa

Necropolis of Bahauddin Naqshbandi, erected in 1544. Bahauddin Naqshbandi was an influential sheikh in Bukhara, a Suffist, and theologian. Sufis and Muslims equated visiting his burial site with a small Hajj
departure: 15:00 Transfer to the Bukhara railway station (Attention: departure and arrival times may be changed according to the train schedule)
15:50 Train departure from Bukhara
19:44 Arrival in Tashkent
